gist.headline: Phantaz Studio joins the garden
gist.blurb: A new creative tool has sprouted! Phantaz Studio is now listed in our showcase, offering AI image generation with stable, shareable links.
gist.summary: Added Phantaz Studio, a web-based AI image generator with stable direct URLs, to the community apps list.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access Phantaz Studio directly from the Pollinations creative showcase.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy art studio setting representing 'Phantaz Studio'. Polly the Bee acts as an artist, emphasizing the creative aspect of the new app. The glowing canvas represents the image generation capability.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny painter's beret in a digital art studio. She is admiring a glowing canvas on an easel alongside the chunky robot companion. The canvas emits a soft lime green (#ecf874) light. Background has pastel gradients and pixel art art supplies. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
